name: Conquest 2 Vyrium Uprising - RTS fans unite ! (Canceled)
blurb: We are putting the "S" back in RTS ! Mouse clicks are more fun when you have to think about them first.

rewards.reward: Digital Downloadable copy of game DRM free for PC. This low price only available for those Zockers who helped fund, and it is half off the retail price of the final game
Previous reward + Downloadable DRM free digital soundtrack by James Hannigan and digital CONQUEST VYRIUM UPRISING graphic novel by Steve Garcia.

Previous rewards + Contributing member status! At this level you are a multiplayer beta tester for our game \u2013 give us your love, hate, anything and everything about the balance of the game, we want the nitty gritty truth. Also, any downloadable content such as mission packs as it becomes available and access to the developer only section of our forums. And your name in the credits baby !!!
Previous rewards + The ability to name a planet in the game, ever want to conquer the Johnson, well you can now ! (Keep it mostly clean please). Plus a custom Vyrium Uprising T-shirt.

Previous rewards + Your voice in the game \u2013 that\u2019s right, we will put your voice in your own version of the game \u2013 The way it will work is we will send you a small script \u2013 you can record your voice, email it back and we will digitize it and give you instructions on how to insert it into your own version of the game, share it with friends, and hear their voices too.

One $150 reward + previous rewards - team signed poster of Conquest Frontier Wars the Vyrium uprising box cover - designed by Steve Garcia AND one custom built collector's copy of the game signed by all team members.
All previous + EARLY ACCESS to the LEVEL EDITOR so that you can be the first to create new content for the game.

Plus all rewards below the $100 level - a Conquest Vyrium uprising custom bobblehead, you send us your picture and we send you a bobblehead in Conquest attire, that looks like you. This is a special order item and our cost is high, but everyone loves a bobblehead, right? RIGHT?
All previous levels, plus your user-created content will be marked with a special insignia so that they'll be highlighted and easy to find, download and play, by yourself and others.

One of all previous rewards + BECOME AN ADMIRAL  \u2013 We will digitize your likeness into Conquest Vyrium Uprising \u2013 as this is a very limited option \u2013 you might not look human by the end, but you will be recognizable to your friends and able to be tagged on facebook \u2013 something we all look forward to \u2013 Clearly ;) Limit of 30
All previous rewards + your voice in the shipped game. We will create a special character in the game that has your image and voice.

One of all previous rewards + Eric Peterson or another team member will come to your town and host a LAN party for you and x amount of your buddies. Offer available for US residents only. It is of course a BYOH party. (Bring your own hardware)

One of all previous rewards + Eric Peterson or another team member will come to your town and host a LAN party for you and x amount of your buddies. Rest of the world - same as $5,000 offer but for Zockers outside the USA. It is of course a BYOH party. (Bring your own hardware)
For $10,000 or $0 you can try the original demo, by cutting and pasting the link below:\r\n\r\nhttp://download.cnet.com/Conquest-Frontier-Wars-demo/3000-2119_4-10229101.html
